short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tracks login locations by collecting serial number, email, and IP for monitoring Chromebook usage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension tracks student login locations by collecting the device's serial number, user email, and IP address. The data is then sent to a specified server for monitoring and security purposes. Ensuring the safety and proper usage of Chromebooks within the school environment.
